name: Cricket
description:
Story Summary - Loss is hard to deal with, especially if it's your own child. Play through an evening of a mother missing apart of herself and see which dream you get in the end.

Instructions -  Use A, D, and E to move around the scenes, interacts with certain tasks and make your way to the ending you receive to hold a conversation with a certain person. There are two endings, which one will you get?

Project Background - This was my individual project which I spent 12 weeks on for my capstone class. The art was entirely done by myself, same for the coding though I did get some great help from one of my Professors, Brian Foster.  Music and sound from Mixkit and Bensound.
